summary: Manages image preprocessing and output postprocessing for the Mask2Former segmentation model, handling tasks such as resizing, normalization, padding, and conversion of model logits into usable segmentation masks.
business_intent: Enables developers to integrate Mask2Former into computerâ€‘vision pipelines by preparing input images and translating model predictions into actionable segmentation results for applications like panoptic, instance, or semantic segmentation.
